title: The Worst of the Worst: The Trump Judges [TEASER]
itunes:title: The Worst of the Worst: The Trump Judges [TEASER]
description:
The hosts discuss Trump's appointees to the federal bench, and the effects that this rogue's gallery of cronies has had - and will continue to have - on the judiciary.


Follow Peter (@The_Law_Boy), Rhiannon (@AywaRhiannon) and Michael (@_FleerUltra) on Twitter.


The full version of this premium episode is available exclusively to our Patreon supporters. To join, visit www.patreon.com/fivefourpod. 




Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
